titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
STEVENS 1924 Mr George Stevens July 1 Gargenville chez Madame Falaise Seine et Oise 11 rue de Verneuil
3 mos 2 vols 40 Dep 40 dep 20
July 1 Psychopathology of Everyday Life July 15 Delusion & Dream Introductory Lectures on Psychoanalysis July 16 Delusion & Dream July 26 p. 2.05 Dream Psychology Totem & Taboo ren July 26 Aug 8 July 26 Leonardo da Vinci July 30 July 30 Psychological Types Aug 8 Aug 8 Beyond the Pleasure Principle ren Sept 2 Aug 25 p. 1.00 The Golden Bowl 2 vols ren Sept 10 Oct 16 Sept 2 Sense of the Past Sept 18 Sept 10 Saint Joan (0,15) Sept 11 Sept 11 Studies, H. Ellis vol I Modesty Sept 19th " 19th Nostromo bought Oct 16 Oct 16 Letters of Dostoevsky Dec 6 p.c. 24 Nov 24 Dec 6 Collected Papers Freud vol I & vol II Ren Oct 1 (0.25) Jan. 6 Jan 1 1924 p.c. due 1 vol 30f subs renewed for 3 m I vol 30 frs Ren. Jan I - April 1 refunded 20 frs 1925 30f Dec 6 - 4f extra Jan 6 Can take Jan 31 Criticism in America (0.15) Feb 2 2 vols Mark Twains autobiograp vol I and II Feb 7 extra dep Feb 7 Spoils of Poynton Feb 14 20f
Feb 14 Tragic Muse vol I Febr 17 " 17 Tragic Muse vol II Feb 21 Feb 21 Aspern Papers Feb 23 " " Lady bird_ (p,10) paid Feb 28 Feb 23 George Meredith (Hammerston) (0,10) March 6 Feb 28 Studies in Classic American Literature (0.14) March 2 March 2 vol 1 Main Currents in Nineteenth Century Literature April 18 March 6 Elsie & the Child (0.15) which vol? March 7 March 7 Ideal of Richard Feverel March 14 March 14 Sons & Lovers ren. to April 14 Juin 4 Renewed April 1 - July 1 1925 30v April 18 Main Currents in Nineteen Century Literature vol II May 23 May 23 May 23 13 May 23 Psychology of Insanity (0,10) 40 days 4.00 July 1 June 4 Jacob's Room June 10 10 Psychology of the Unconscious 6 days 60 July 1 overdue 4.60 June 19 Craft of Fiction. July 1 3 books were sent July 1 from Atlantic Hotel owes 4.60 Concanneau
